title: FireCracker Jinx Skin Release date Jan 31st ???
body:
Is this true?? according to a google search, various sites are saying firecracker jinx coming out on the 31st

however, i cant find a single thing on any official league page about any new skin for jinx, like at all. so maybe im just bad at searching ??

replies.body: Her and the rest of the new skins are coming out in patch 5.2 during the lunar revel/Chinese new year around mid February
Well thats a bunch of bs because its 5.2 right now -_-
Mid February?? That's a pain, they should of waited to show it on League then, cause now I want the damn thing.

ooooo that makes sense, i was curious as to why jinx is getting all asian'd out. didnt make sense till now.

not that its bad.. i really like the skin. and Mulan style graphics x)
Chinese New Years should be the 20th as I recall

> [{quoted}](name=Yulen Xoshxius,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TffinmqN,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-01-28T19:59:33.581+0000)
>
> Chinese New Years should be the 20th as I recall

It's the 19th.
doesn't mean they coming out on that particular date.

Its normally a week before the event such as how Halloween get their skins 1 week before the actual Halloween date

so its should be the 12th when the skins come
February 3rd i hope your right ive been throwing my wallet all day XD {{champion:222}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}}
Pretty sure it will be February 3rd if all follows the way Riot does things.

She will most likely come out a few week before the Chinese new year/ lunar revel to get us ready for it. Not on that particular date. It's all in the marketing scheme. They preview her before so that the hype starts up and everyone is excited then they finally release her. Increases profit.
{{champion:222}}
I don't know. I was wondering when also. But I see the skin showing up in League, during skin selection for Jinx, but it is unavailable to buy yet. I sure hope it does come out tomorrow.
I see it on my list but says unavailable???
